
    SELECT 
        p.Id AS [AnswerId],
        p.ParentId AS [QuestionId],
        p.CreationDate AS [AnswerCreationDate],
        p.Score AS [AnswerScore],
        p.Body AS [AnswerBody],
        p.OwnerUserId AS [AnswerAuthorId],
        p.OwnerDisplayName AS [AnswerAuthorName]
    FROM 
        Posts p
    WHERE 
        p.PostTypeId = 2  -- Answer posts
        AND p.ParentId IN (57509118,57806624,57839795,58222386,58630097,58643905,59236611,59302035,59566458,59759353,60157702,60349533,60380374,60840243,60881927,61096521,61208421,61535020,61828726,62370850,62547923,62908594,63050024,63288356,63569560,63952543,64078671,64169578,64272276,64359222,64721253,64859065,64891521,64930068,65011370,65170927,65199532,65205928,65357083,65601569,65820392,65893608,65925430,66088277,66273666,66358295,66358482,66438446,66598412,66918575,67343722,67472935,67720527,67786526,67800532,67861379,67865682,67989505,68005219,68108398,68136219,68245374,68303446,68303502,68634487,68692017,68759913,68767043,68812228,68873088,68887428,68938010,69160610,69255724,69263214,69314615,69368262,69385940,69430109,69465391,69520599,69528377,69770836,69934707,70332762,70386041,70610678,70623275,70636392,70734715,70758763,70765867,70907287,70953788,71885354,72017244,72038527,72278554,72295509,72367855,72437988,72493761,72570201,72784760,72819996,72994320,73018888,73080088,73128465,73178417,73255602,73319566,73394214,73626276,73717018,73822327,74111130,74112918,74305339,74478449,74550179,74601050,74775432,74869907,74887938,74912797,75045263,75061237,75268325,75337206,75386396,75399577,75447011,75462617,75468298,75583227,75620346,75733616,75739960,75838160,75839566,75884083,75941428,75991359,76029565,76181798,76183721,76279262,76312191,76324589,76405126,76424344,76434747,76484161,76512235,76570482,76681761,76705251,76734107,76746551,76749213,76751156,76756736,76797766,76861533,76887397,76899809,76924487,76952023,76969053,76971088,77009521,77099483,77158031,77181854,77268763,77283060,77318666,77395114,77446605,77469265,77519735)
    ORDER BY 
        p.ParentId, p.CreationDate;
